author: Gergely Staszkiv
description: Gergely’s inspiration: “Positivity Power is a world movement to communicate a philosophy of loving, caring and sharing. Everybody is equal and if we help each other then we can build a better place for our children. My cocktail’s name, La Fuerza Positiva, can be translated as ‘the power of positivity.”
name: Fuerza Positiva
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
10 ml Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
